title: Çıplak Gerçek
overview: Hazal is an 18-year-old young woman who left her home 3 days ago and has been missing since then. Her parents who are divorced and do not communicate much realize she has dissapeared too late. Hazal's mother and her new husband Harun go to the police station to report her missing. After that, Hazal's father also joins them and the investigation starts. Galip who is the head of investigation calls into question everyone who is close to her. And the suprising truths starts to come out.....
